entry.title: [GRA7][Web PaaS] - Foundation upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 9, 18:00 UTC  -  May 10, 01:00 UTC

Apr 27, 12:01 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/05/2022 18:00 UTC
End time : 10/05/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. However, some short interruption may be observed for a few minutes.
Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance.
But projects provisioning won't be impacted.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade the version of the foundation for WebPaas.

entry.title: [Internet Access] - Internet connection
entry.content:
May 4, 14:22 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 02/05/2022 08:34 UTC
End time :02/05/2022 18:20 UTC
Service impact : Some instabilities were observed on some access.
Root cause: Our teams repaired the fiber cut and the link is in a stable condition since . Service is working as expected at this time.

May 3, 07:52 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 02/05/2022 08:34 UTC
End time :02/05/2022 18:20 UTC
Service impact : Some instabilities were observed on some access.
Root cause: Our teams repaired the fiber cut and the link is in a stable condition since . Service is working as expected at this time.

May 2, 20:41 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our teams repaired the fiber cut and the link is in a stable condition since 18:20 UTC.
Our teams are monitoring the incident to ensure that everything is good.

May 2, 14:23 UTC
Update - UPDATE: The collection operator has located the fiber cut and is starting the repair work.
We will keep you updated as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

May 2, 12:47 UTC
Identified - Start time : 02/05/2022 08:34 UTC
Service impact : Some instabilities are observed on some access.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working to bring back services at their usual states.
Traffic has been redirected through an other route.

entry.title: [Global][SIP] - Call for C5C subscriber
entry.content:
May 3, 12:57 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 03/05/2022 09:40 UTC
End Time : 03/05/2022 11:30UTC
Service status: Service is working as expected at this time.
Root cause : It xas due to a bug on a binary Cirpack, it had lost connexion with the rtp (gateways that pass the media stream ,voice) forwarders.
Current status : Resolved

May 3, 11:24 UTC
Update - Currently all the Sip lines are up, there are still a few Mgcp to go up.

May 3, 10:31 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

May 3, 10:21 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 03/05/2022 09:40 UTC
Service impact : We have encountered an unavailability of calls between 09h40 UTC and 10h05 UTC
Ongoing actions : Our teams monitor the situation

entry.title: [Spain][VOIP] - Interconnect
entry.content:
Apr 26, 08:43 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
End Time : 2022/04/26 08:30 UTC
Service impact : Following this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Current status : Resolved
A patch has been deployed. The situation is back to its state prior the incident.

Apr 6, 09:30 UTC
Identified - Start time : 2022/03/28 16:03 UTC
Service impact : Folowing this incident Incident link we now have an issue with some Spanish numbers. They end up with an Unassigned number error.
There are a number of numbers that cannot be reached. This is not related to a signaling defect but to a routing defect of some operators to these numbers.
Ongoing actions : We have opened tickets with 2 operators to correct the problem.
Unfortunately the main protagonist Telefonica complicates things and does not respond willingly to the problems reported. We will get back to you with updates soon
